+func retryCommand(program string, args []string) error {
+	var err error
+	for i := 0; i < 3; i++ {
+		cmd := exec.Command("git", args...)
+		cmd.Stdout = os.Stdout
+		cmd.Stderr = os.Stderr
+		if err = cmd.Run(); err == nil {
+			break
+		}
+	}
+	return err
+}
